campaign.story:
HEXplore It™ is a cooperative, hero building, adventure, board game system. The Sands of Shurax is our third title in the HEXplore It universe. It is both a stand alone game and an expansion for our previous Volumes. Journey into an entrancing land filled with danger and intrigue.
The Ravager has awoken! A titanic creature deposits Crystal Towers on the map while your adventure unfolds. Make your way across the desert to perform Missions, work with Caravan Masters, gain Employment, or even enter the gladiatorial Arenas. Battle through a variety of Encounters during your travels, or move carefully and see what other Excavations you might unearth. Power Up your heroes and choose one of the four scenarios to win. Can you save Shurax from the Ravager?
Cooperative game play (1 vs All play is available with the Expansion)
Fantasy-themed hero building 
Variable hero powers and dozens of combinations 
Organic & customizable hero advancement 
Modular board: maps interlock with past and future Volumes
Strategic movement, exploration, questing, and farming mechanics 
Dice-rolling & press-your-luck scenarios 
Several alternative playing styles; Quick Play, Double Up, Marathon, Solo Play
Multi-Volume: Can be played with the Valley of the Dead King, the Forests of Adrimon, or future HEXplore It Volumes
Dynamic play duration; you choose the length of play
6 levels of game difficulty
Story immersion; players choose how much of the story they want to experience
Players create their hero by combining two character options: their Role and Race. This combination drives your hero's strengths, weaknesses, and defines your special abilities. We've build a bunch of unique choices for you, so no two games will ever play the same.
You'll work together to gather Platinum, Gold, Ravager Crystals, and Power Ups in order to advance your hero's strength while the Ravager wipes out crucial locations on the board. Choose your own path and explore a modular map which changes with each play through. Each game yields substantially different events, some controlled by the players, and others occurring randomly. Fulfill one of four unique game win scenarios, and gather as much power as you can along the way!  
Core Box
The Sands of Shurax Core Box contains everything you need to bring your adventurers into the heart of the desert. As the campaign progresses, we'll add more content! Check out our Stretch Goals section below for more information on the added content.

The World
Nomadic legends speak of a great worm slumbering beneath the sands, stoking the fiery heat of the desert. Tales were told how the beast would awaken when the desert grew too cool, emerging from its slumber to bake the world above. For centuries the desert has grown and extended, proving, say the tribesmen, that the Ravager grows stronger. A storybook is now included in each Core box!
Stretch Goals 
Campaign Mode has been unlocked!
We are beyond excited to bring you an entirely new way to play HEXplore It! These digital chapter books present new, augmented rules to play through an entire multi-session campaign using the same heroes! 
You’ll use specific map tiles and play through a ton of new content in these choose-your-own adventure scenarios. Players are presented with several “What do you do” choice branches throughout the course of play. Each decision you make will drive how the scenario unfolds in this chapter and in chapters that occur in later modules. For more info on Campaign Mode, check out this update.
Klik’s Madness follows the rise and fall of Goblin Emperor Klik as hordes of goblins become better organized under his command, raiding and pillaging the Runecrest Valley. Your heroes will have the opportunity to save NPC’s, earn new campaign items, get captured in Under Valley, witness Klik’s transformation into an Undead Lieutenant working for the Dead King and much more! 
In the Fall of the Ancients, the heroes will attempt to keep Hathowyr and Urgos' mind safe from the Magi's influence. They'll work for Elowen the Dryad, moving through the forest to stop Adrimon in her tracks. You may come face to face with Sarthowyr the dark dryad, and a cult of humans who feel Adrimon is a goddess. The story can unfold in a myriad of ways, and we can't wait for you to get your hands on it! 
In Noko's Ritual, our heroes will find themselves unwittingly woven into the terrible plans of Emperor Noko, who works to summon the Ravager of Shurax. The heroes will begin the campaign working as guards for the City-State of Tarri and will unknowingly aid the tyrant in gathering the resources he needs to perform the ritual. Early in the story the heroes may uncover the terrible truth, and will gain the option to continue to help Noko, or to devise a plan of their own to stop him- possibly preventing the Ravager from even being summoned! 
Are you ready for this new way to play through HEXplore It content? 
Expansion
Expansion Highlights:
 A new Play Style: the Ravager vs. All: Like our previous Volumes, the SoS Expansion allows you to play as the Villain against the other heroes. This play style includes a dry erase Boss mat for the Ravager! Like the heroes, you'll be able to raise its ranks by performing Ambitions. You’ll choose how to ruin the map, and will have an entire card deck to yourself. You’ll also have access to powerful Rituals, which you can perform by expending your Ritual Points. You’ll be forced to react to them, and better yet, force them to react to YOU! There are several ways to play as the Ravager, which means no two games facing off against the heroes will be the same.
 New Bosses: There are four new bosses that appear in the Sands of Shurax Expansion box. These bosses each have unique reveal triggers.
 Traits: Traits give your hero a distinguishing quality that you gain at the beginning of the game. Check out our video about Traits here. 
 HEXclusive Heroes: We're offering more HEXclusive Roles and Races. These heroes are more powerful than our normal heroes. They are perfect for solo play, or can be used in small groups to up the ante and increase the Difficulty of your game. We hope you enjoy them as much as we do!
 The Black Pyramid: HEXplore It's very first Maze! 
The Black Pyramid: Perhaps one of the most exciting aspects of the Sands of Shurax Expansion is the inclusion of the Black Pyramid. We've built the Black Pyramid to be its own play-style. You can go through the entire game, gathering power, facing new threats, terrifying versions of the Bosses, and perhaps most importantly, uncover epic new gear! The Black Pyramid is laden with traps and secrets chambers, so beware adventurers! 
Familiar Mechanics: Here are just a few of the familiar mechanics you'll find in SoS that also appear in previous volumes.
New Mechanics: Sands of Shurax is no mere reskin of our previous volumes. Here are just a few of the new mechanics we've implemented which makes the Sands of Shurax entirely unique! Check out our videos page for more information on these.
New Game Locations: There are several new location types in the Sands of Shurax. Caravansaries are locations where the heroes can purchase low-value goods and join a Caravan. The heroes can heal Energy and refill their food stores while in an Oasis.
Unlike Quests or Destinations (introduced in Volumes I and II), Missions are not tied to specific locations on the map. Instead, Mission locations are grouped into three terrain categories: Desert, Highland, and Silt Sea. Heroes may go to any Mission location that matches the terrain type to attempt to complete the Mission there.
Arenas & Scarabs: We’ve built in 2 new mini-games into HEXplore It: the Sands of Shurax. The heroes can now earn fame and fortune in gladiatorial arenas and can gamble away their fortune playing Scarabs. For more info on each system works, check out our videos page.
The Wastes & Caravans: The Wastes is an area at the center of the board that is separated from the four quadrants and the other HEXtiles. This simulates a great distance between the City-States. To cross from one section to another, the heroes will need to travel with Caravans (or find the Magic Carpet!). Work with Caravan Masters to move into and out of the Wastes. Each journey will present unique challenges, risks, and rewards. Check out our videos on the Wastes for more info.
Remnants & Mutations: Remnants are 3-hex map tiles that are placed on the board when the Ravager disappears back under the earth, leaving huge Crystal Towers in its wake. Crystal Towers are dangerous places where heroes become Irradiated and gain Mutations. Mutations reduce your maximum Energy ranks, but also grant special bonuses and increase the Power Up reward you receive for a particular stat.
Both the heroes and their opponents can gain Mutations, but Opponent Mutations function a little differently than Hero Mutations. Check out our Mutation video below for more info on these. 
The City-States & Reputation: In the Sands of Shurax, your heroes will gain Reputation, which is a bit like their alignment. The four Reputation regions are: Righteous, Rebellious, Cruel, and Corrupt. 
The City States are each aligned with two of the four Reputation regions.  You’ll earn rewards for interacting with City-States whose Reputation matches your own, and  encounter dangerous scenarios when interacting in a City-State whose Reputation does not. Each City-State gives the heroes access to a new way to gain power.
The heroes can also find work in each of the City-States, spending time to earn both Gold and Reputation. Earn more Gold based on your Role type in certain locations. For instance, Strikers earn more Gold while Employed in Tarri, while Healers earn more Gold while Employed in Phorora.
Heal the sick and help the poor in Phorora.
Become a street hand, helping merchants or picking pockets in Dria.
Become soulless guards of Emperor Noko, patrolling the streets of Tarri.
Perform for the wealthy in Nemsynet’s smoky gambling dens.
We've built in systems to prevent an entire game being spent in a City-State, however clever heroes can find ways to focus play there, instead of in the Wastes. Check out our video below for more info on the City-States.
New Opponent Subtypes: We're introducing a few new subtypes of opponents in the Sands of Shurax. Our heroes will now face Swarms and Hordes, opponents which have a new Vital called Outlast. Your normal attacks are largely ineffective against them. 
In addition to Swarms and Hordes, we're also unveiling Titanic opponents. The Ravager is our first. These foes have more than one Health stat. Some opponents can even Mutate to gain the Titanic subtype. For more information on these new systems, click the video link below.
Rule book
A beta version of the HEXplore It app is now available for download for both Android and Apple users. Check it out:
iOS users, click here to install.
Android users, click here to install.
We are excited to announce that a new print cycle for both previous Volumes and their Expansions has been unlocked. These boxes will arrive at the same time as our Sands of Shurax products (they will not ship out early). Check out our new pledge levels to gain bundle deals! Here are some things our previous backers are saying about Volumes I and II:
Check out our hero randomizer on our website. Click away to create your next hero!
Dual Games - Play more than one Volume at a time.
If you have the Valley of the Dead King or the Forests of Adrimon, you can play along with Sands of Shurax in one session. You'll have two main bosses on the board (aside from the other 18!), both main bosses will be gaining power, and depending on how your game progresses, one or the other will take the upper hand.
Imagine if the Dead King came to control an undead version of the Ravager, or perhaps just as bad, Adrimon mindwiped the Ravager!  You'll need to defeat both in order to win this game. Your group will have access to all content that both games offer:  
Visit several new game locations.
Complete Quests, Destinations, or Missions.
Gain new items and build Relics.
Acquire Gold, Platinum or Nature's Essence in order to gain powerful treasures. 
Attempt to destroy up to 18 more bosses! 
Power Up your heroes in an epic way using this play style.

Sample Volume I and II Dual Game setup
What are add ons? Add ons are items that we're selling apart from the pledge levels shown on the right sidebar. If you're interested in any of the below items, simply add up the cost of all add ons that you'd like to grab, and increase your pledge amount by the result. Living Card Decks: Our Living Card Campaign for the Valley of the Dead King is now complete, our Forests of Adrimon Living Card campaign is well underway, and our Sands of Shurax Living card campaign will begin when the games begin to ship.
We are offering new content for each of these volumes in the stand-alone decks shown below. The HEXplore It Hero Chest: We’re now releasing a premium storage box for the HEXplore It system. This box has three independent containers inside. It will hold all Roles, Races, Traits, and Legendary cards that we’re planning to release in the HEXplore It gaming line, and it comes with a bunch of extra content!

Kickstarter Card of the Day Videos: Each day of the campaign we're showing off a new card that appears in the game. Click the video link below to watch them all.

Social Sharing: Our next Stretch Goal is just around the corner, but we could use your help spreading the news! The easiest way to do so is to follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, BGG, or YouTube and spread this campaign link in the forums you're a part of. Here are a few extra handy links:

Tariff Disclaimer: Due to the uncertainty of the current administration as it relates to tariffs, these shipping costs are subject to change. Our promise to you is that we’ll only change our pricing structure if we’re forced into that situation. Thankfully, tariffs were not enacted earlier in 2019; we’re simply adding this disclaimer to be transparent with you. If you’re unaware of how tariffs can affect the board game industry, check out this article: https://www.polygon.com/2019/6/5/18652411/trump-china-tariff-board-games. 
Flat Kickstarter Shipping Rates: One thing you'll find about our campaign, we're locking in our shipping prices based on the structure shown above. Timeline
Our first campaign delivered on time, and our second campaign delivered 3 months later than we had promised. This is largely due to the fact that we created 3 new boxes and remastered a fourth (volume 1 core). campaign.story:
After the Empire is a tower defense and worker placement game for 2-4 players. In After the Empire, you'll be recruiting refugees, gathering resources and fortifying your defenses in order to prepare for assault after assault of invaders seeking to sack your castle and take its riches. 
 Cost:  While we would love to offer free shipping, there really is no such thing. Shipping is really expensive and we have tried to come up with pricing that accurately reflects our cost to get the game into your hands without creating a logistical nightmare on our side. There's a lot of plastic pieces and awesome game to pack up here, and that doesn't make it any cheaper. Your shipping will be added in the pledge manager.  We expect that we'll have to come out of pocket a bit based on what we are charging and we are ok with that.    
Tracking: We will also be using non-trackable shipments in some cases in order to save on cost as tracking can add 30-50% or more in some cases. So please understand if we do not have tracking with your package we did so knowingly. Rest assured, that we will get you your game and any risk associated with a package not being trackable is on us.  
 Delivery time: While we would love to get everyone their games at the same time, it is just not possible. There is a high likelihood that some areas of the world will get their games before others. Our commitment is to get the games ready and printed as fast as possible (we've already done a ton of the prep work). At the factory we will break out the shipments to each fulfillment company with instructions to them that they should begin shipping as soon as possible upon receipt. In addition, because we have complete control over the U.S. shipments, you will not be able to order and receive the game on Amazon (or from any other US retailer) before our backers have it.   (Please note: Because of unexpected delays and other unforseen issues, we reserve the right to sell the game at major conventions, even if they have not been delivered yet).  The reason for this is that conventions are among the best form of marketing and therefore necessary to give the game the best chance for success.  One guarantee we will give is that if we do release anywhere before the backers receive theirs it will be at a price that is higher (usually significantly) than what was offered in the campaign.)  

The fine print stuff:
What does "Exclusive" mean? You've probably noticed we do not say Kickstarter Exclusive but rather show a logo with our image (or another company image) and the word exclusive.  What this means is that these items will never be available in retail and only through us or the company depicted on the logo.  However, while they may be available from us in the future, they will most certainly not be given away for free.  In most cases, the cost of putting together the same package you might back in our campaign is 50% more or higher afterward.
Other: Lastly, we will be using fulfillment companies in different parts of the world and while we have done our best to ensure we pick good ones, ultimately, once the games get into their warehouses there is little control we have at that point. We have always done our best to bend over backwards for our customers and if for some reason there are any issues with damages, missing components or missing shipments we will make it right. It just might require some patience.  
Why back this campaign? While we have had great success with other games like Deception: Murder in Hong Kong and Champions of Midgard, we are still a relatively small company and we just do not have the funds needed to fund every project we do without some help. Your pledge gets you all the exclusive unlocked content which will not be available in retail... only through us.  Plus, if you live in the U.S the game will be in your hands before someone can get it from an online retailer.  Lastly, we expect the standard retail version of the game to be $99 MSRP, which won't get any of the cool exclusives that you'll get on this campaign.  If you live outside the U.S, we will do our best to get it into your hands first. Also, pledging helps get us closer to buying our company "team building" yacht.  
This project is promoted by Green Inbox.

campaign.story:
“This is the Wandering Sea. The gods have brought you here, and you must wake them if you wish to return home.”
In Sleeping Gods--and its expansion, Tides of Ruin--you and up to three friends become Captain Sofi Odessa and her crew, lost in a strange world in 1929 on your steamship, the Manticore. You must work together to survive, exploring mysterious islands, meeting new characters, and seeking out the totems of the gods so that you can return home.
Explore a massive, open world in a game atlas of connecting maps (26 pages in total).
Includes a novel-length storybook to read as you explore, filled with danger, discovery, and intrigue.
Level up your crew members over a 10-20 hour campaign.
Play multiple campaigns to unlock secrets and discover hidden treasures. It will take many campaigns to explore the entire world.
The cooperative play allows players to jump in or out with ease, and the flexible game system allows you to stop and save your game at any time.
Fight ferocious beasts with a unique diceless combat system that rewards good planning. 
Story decisions have deep and lasting consequences. A village might burn to the ground because you want to protect your crew. A desperate captain might seek revenge when you can’t help rescue his wife. The game includes hundreds of quests, each with multiple outcomes.
1-4 Players, Ages 13+

International shipments will be subject to customs charges depending on the country to which you are shipping (if you are shipping to an address in the US, EU, UK, Canada, or Australia, you will not have a customs charge).
Retail Version: The standard retail version of Sleeping Gods will not include metal coins but it will include many of the stretch goals we reach here.
Changing Backer Levels: After the project ends, backers can add additional copies and a few other limited Red Raven products to their rewards through the pledge manager.
It is possible that this game will be printed later by international publishers in various languages. Please take this into consideration when deciding if you would like to pledge.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our seventeenth Kickstarter project, and with each project, we could not have printed and produced them without our Kickstarter backers. We depend on the funds raised to produce, print, ship, and support the games we make with updates, rules videos, and excellent customer service. Sleeping Gods is almost ready to print, but it won't happen without your support!

There are many other challenges to making sure any Kickstarter project is successful. Because of occasional unforeseen events, it is common for board game production to be delayed. We've done all we can to ensure that this game will be delivered on time if funded. Of course, delays can happen, but the majority of our projects have been delivered early.

Another challenge is making sure that all the files and rules are correct when sent to the printer. Ryan has done the graphic design and artwork for many games. His experience helps ensure a smooth pre-production process.

With your help, we can have the funds to print the game, deal with any obstacles, and make sure you are delivered a quality product.

Hey there Trolley Fans!

We hope you're all staying safe, healthy, and off the trolley tracks as much as possible. We just wanted to reach out on this lovely Tuesday morning and let you know about another web comic-related Kickstarter that the fine folks at Skybound are working on:

Hey there young Kickstarts!

We also have some exciting news! Trolley Tom is BACK and needs your help more than ever, to help make his decisions for him. This time, he’s deciding who’s been naughty and who’s been nice… that’s right, he’s not just Trolley Tom anymore, get ready for .

Hello all you Trolley Hoppers!
This campaign has been a whirlwind, and we’re thankful that you all took a chance on us and backed it! It was incredibly fun, so thank you guys for that! Now that the vast majority of games have been out for a bit, things are winding down slightly on our end. We wanted to give you guys an update on how things will be  moving forward.
Numbers wise, the campaign is 91% completed. The other 9% represents backers who have either never responded to their PledgeManager email or backers who started it but didn’t actually finish it. Of course the PledgeManager system isn’t perfect, and it’s possible you never got your email. I tried to help by posting several updates reminding you all to do it, just in case you didn’t get your email, but I'm aware those may have also slipped through the cracks. Even though we were trying to cover all the bases, we understand that everyone has different circumstances, and things may have still been missed accidentally. I’m here to let the remaining 9% of you know that there’s no need to worry! You will still get your games, and, in fact, your entire original orders, unaltered! Since the PledgeManager is locked, you’re not able to complete your orders on your end anymore. In order to still get your games, you can reach out to me, Maya, at  for help putting your address in and getting you on our weekly batches. Moving forward, we’ll be sending out small weekly batches to get your games to you. I submit the batches to QuarterMaster every Thursday, and they get shipped out the next week. You can also shoot me an email if you’re just curious about tracking or any sort of updates with your order in general. Now that things are really winding down, we won’t be doing regular updates anymore. Here’s a bunch of links to all of our websites and social media which will alert you of new games and new fun in general!

Locking the PledgeManager

Hey y'all!
So, a little more info about the delay. There were quite a few things that factored into us missing December as the estimated fulfillment window. It isn't actually very hard to be off on an estimate by a month. There is a lot that goes into making something on the other side of the world and then shipping it to all corners of said earth.
We added the Tram Sam mini pretty late in the campaign, and we had to get that mold started much later than the other molds. Typically, molds take 30-45 days to make, and there is no speeding those up. We really wanted to give you guys a great quality Tram Sam miniature, so we knew that was going to make our timeline a little tighter. As expected, it did.

campaign.story:
Etherfields is a new major miniature Board Game by Awaken Realms. We call this totally different BG experience a Dream Crawler – you will dive into surreal and artistically crafted world and follow one of a kind co-op / solo campaign adventure for 1-4 players. Everything you do will change the strange rhythm of the Etherfields dream world, where even the wildest fantasy is possible. 
Gameplay created by the Board Game veteran Michał Oracz (author of This War of Mine: TBG, Neuroshima Hex or The Edge: Dawnfall and many others), will test not only your logical skills but also your intuition, deduction, and emotional intelligence. Develop your character from scratch using advanced deck-building, travel through the dream-world map and delve deeper into chosen locations.

“I’m really blown away by my experience with this game so far (…) It’s an amazing well of creativity!” 
  - Rahdo
“This one is real puzzler, it’s so vastly different that anything I have played (…) Really excited about this one!”
  - Ant Lab Games
"Etherfields is as a surreal and meaningful journey into a dream world that begs to be discovered."
 - Man vs Meeple
 “Etherfields is an immersive experience. The constant state of discovery and the unknown keeps you glued to the table. The game mechanisms are well integrated and just pull you deeper and deeper into this dream world. A dream world I don’t want to leave!” 
- Rolling solo
"Etherfields is a magical combination of mechanics, card driven story, and an experience that just draws you in and does not want to let go. "
- theMCGuiRE review  
"Creative use of components and fantastic art really delivers on the idea of adventures in the dream world; creating an immersive and evocative experience."
 - Ready Steady Play 
„All in all, Etherfields is really, really unique and very, very cool game. Its got intense narrative to it, it got amazing components and amazing artwork!” 
- Crabbok
“From the beginning I liked this a little weird, mysterious, a bit twisted, abstract atmosphere that this game offers.” 
– ON TABLE 
Amazing gameplay will be accompanied by one of the most striking miniatures and art we have ever made. Our experienced team put their entire artistic skill and hearts into this project, making sure the designs are extremely unique and successfully evoke the fleeting world of dreams. 
Etherfields will be packed with fresh and unique art. Your every skill, action, and even the smallest event will be illustrated with an outstanding craftsmanship. 
Your body has been taken. That's the only thing you know for sure. Your memory has faded away, as you drifted to this strange world of dark dreams. You are an empty vessel now. Looking around, you find masks lying around. Which one will you choose? What story will you follow?
Something is coming, and you can feel it – one dream, consuming all others, leaving a faint smell of poppy seeds. What does the Funeral Witch want of you?
Your Heroes will be defined by their memory chests. These skills have some of the most surprising rules you ever witnessed in a Board Game – from literally escaping current reality to your “dream room” for a few turns, up to time modifying time or rewriting the reality. In dreams, no rules are unbreakable!
Throughout the game, you will very often modify your chest with amazing new cards, but also with curses or filters.

Every interaction you will have in this strange world leaves a mark – and may lead to surprising results, as normal rules do not apply in Etherfields. You've managed to finally extinguish the ever-burning Lighthouse in Tideless Port?  This may help you find that key you have been looking for, but now Umbrageous will hunt you down through other dreams.

During the game, fighting will never be your only option. Quite often it might actually be the worst option, as in dreams everyone you kill may come back, angrier and weirder. Instead, all characters may interact on two other levels – through cheating or utilizing their perception.
 Etherfields will test you in many different ways: secret rules that you can discover or deduce by looking closely on the map; drafting cards based on art or name only; guessing the intentions of entities you meet by considering what they do. 
Big, mind-melting concepts are the fuel of Etherfields, and we can't wait for you to discover them!  
 Click here for full version!

We have currently successfully founded eight Kickstarter projects. We have successfully delivered so far:
The Edge miniature universe, Awakening project, This War of Mine the boardgame, Lords of Hellas, The Edge Dawnfall, 1st wave of Nemesis and are currently at the finish line on production of Nemesis 2nd wave and Tainted Grail 1st wave.

Please note that this is not a pre-order and the final product might slightly change in the process or get delayed. We are fully devoted to creating an amazing experience and you can trust us that every choice we make will only be aimed at improving the standard of the final product.

campaign.story:
What is Reforge?
Reforge is a weapon crafting, battle royale card game! It combines the fun of crafting a unique blade with the polyhedral dice combat of D&D! Players start the game with a lowly wooden grip and Adventurer blade and compete on the tabletop battlefield to forge more powerful weapons with a plethora of grips, guards, and blades to power up their attack and defense, all while utilizing gadgets and shields to turn the tides of battle in their favor. The last player standing wins! For more detailed rules, scroll down a bit or watch our video! 
The detailed rules and a printable PDF version of the rules can be found here!
Photo from demo event at Cool Comics & Games in Cape Coral, FL.
All 56 unique cards included in Reforge.
Here's how they fit together during a game.
Here's the layout with a four player game.
Where did the idea come from?
The idea for Reforge came to me (Stephen) in a dream early 2019 that involved a card game where you build swords. I immediately started writing down what I saw in my dream and built off of that. The game mechanics came after as I experimented with custom made cards. After working tirelessly for a couple months, I had a product that I was happy to show to the world! After doing some conventions and demos, I'm really looking forward to getting the game into peoples hands!
I work full time in a hospital, but have always wanted to create. I haven't stopped since this idea came to me, and I don't intend to until it is realized!
About the team!
The team for Reforge includes game designer Stephen Royka and artist Sam Donez (Twixxo). After being best friends since high school, we decided to make something awesome together! Reforge is the result of decades of love for gaming and cartoon art.
 I (Stephen) love videogames, with my favorites being Okami, Resident Evil 4, Hollow Knight, and Bloodborne to name a few. I work as an ultrasound tech to pay for my love of game design. I'm hoping to be able to transition into working full time on card game design for my new company Secret Boss Games someday! 
Sam is an artist by hobby and trade. While he kicks ass at cartoon art, his real focus is 3D environmental design. Check out his stuff on his website, Art By Twixxo!
Why the $6,000 goal?
The initial goal is primarily to cover production costs for game and shipping costs from the factory. We are trying to keep this goal as low as possible because we really want this to get made. From the quotes we've gotten, it's looking like this will just be enough to cover all those costs. We have put tons of time, money, and effort into this project and want nothing more than to see it become a reality that people love!
And what about that $8,000 stretch goal? (Reduced from $10,000!)
If we hit that response, then every copy of Reforge purchased on the Kickstarter will include four sets of polyhedral dice! You need dice to play the game, but we have a solution just in case we don't reach that stretch goal. A webapp will be available for free that acts as a companion for Reforge to keep track of health and roll attack die! The app is currently in development, but a preview of its functionality can be seen here. We really want to ship the game with dice for a complete experience (and we know most people would prefer the feel of real dice!) so we really hope we can reach this goal!
We recently received new quotes from manufacturing facilities, so we will be able to bring Reforge to everyone with dice if we reach our stretch goal of $8,000!
Check below for info on gameplay, rewards, and more!
 For more of the nitty gritty details for the rules, check out the complete rule list here!
Thank you to all the generous Tier 7 backers! Here are the Final Blades that they came up with that will be included in every copy of Reforge!

campaign.story:
We are proud to introduce you to the world’s FIRST ever Hot Chocolate Shaker. 
At the Chocolate Society we’ve been pushing chocolate boundaries since 1991. 
What is the Hot Chocolate Shaker?
World's First Hot Chocolate Shaker
As the name suggests, the Hot Chocolate Shaker is a utensil designed for shaking a hot chocolate. Shaking a hot chocolate will result in a quicker, smoother and more delicious hot chocolate with the added benefit of a little theatre. 
The secret to a great hot chocolate is the formation of an emulsion between the chocolate and hot liquid. If you fail to create an emulsion, you will find your hot chocolate is weak, has poor texture and typically will have pieces of chocolate sitting at the bottom of the cup. 
As artisan chocolatiers, we knew that to form an emulsion we had to create friction to bind the chocolate and hot liquid together. When we looked at stirring the chocolate and hot liquid together we found that not enough friction was being created to bind the two together. 
The Challenge:
When we started shaking a hot chocolate, we saw that it created an emulsion very quickly, however we also found that the shakers would explode resulting in chocolate all over our kitchen. 
The Solution:
We discovered that when a hot liquid is shaken, the air trapped in the shaker warms due to the hot liquid and expands in volume. This means that a pressure is created when shaking a hot liquid. 
If the shaker does not have anyway of accommodating that pressure, it will result in a hot chocolate explosion. Upon understanding this, we decided to try to develop an expanding shaker that would accommodate this pressure. We achieved this with our innovative popping lid. 
Other features of the Hot Chocolate Shaker include: Double Walled Beaker, Tritan Shatterproof BPA Free Plastic, Dishwasher Safe, Microwave Safe, Made in the UK, Recyclable.
Hot Chocolate Shaker Features
How to Use The Shaker:
1. Reset the Shaker:
Resetting the shaker lid is the most important part of using the shaker. To reset the shaker, simply push the popping lid so it is in the 'Down' position. The clip below shows how this is done.
PLAY

2. Filling & Shaking:
Once you have the lid ready in the Reset position. Simply follow the below steps for deliciously smooth hot chocolate in seconds. The great thing about the shaker, is you can use solid pieces of chocolate, you don't need to use powders or flakes, you can simply chop up your favourite chocolate bar and shake!
How to use the Hot Chocolate Shaker
The Journey:
The Hot Chocolate Shaker journey started two years ago when we first came up with the idea. 
We have had the tooling designed and made and run first offs, we are now looking to place our first order.
Your Support:
We feel that we have created a truly innovative product that looks set to shake up the hot chocolate market, 
In order to bring this product to market we need to hit a minimum quantity of shakers and that’s where you come in. By supporting us, you will be pre-buying one of our rewards, which will allow us to place our first Hot Chocolate Shaker order. 
As a thank you for supporting us, our rewards are all at greatly reduced prices – up to 60% in some cases. 
The Timeline:
We hope to be sending the shakers in September 2019, if not sooner. 
If we can fund this project and hit our target we can go to production very quickly. 
A Vehicle For Creativity:
One of the most exciting aspects of the Hot Chocolate Shaker is that since we have been using it, our creativity for hot chocolate has expanded enormously. 
We believe our product is versatile and unique as it enables you to use
- different types of hot liquids (milk, dairy alternatives or even just water).
- to serve the product hot or cold.
- different infusions and alcohols.
- different chocolate types, origins and percentages.

The Hot Chocolate Shaker is something completely different, it’s a kitchen gadget and it has been a huge learning curve to bring it to market. campaign.story:
Kung Fu Fighting is a fast, hilarious, action-packed card game for 2-6 players in which you are a combatant in a free-for-all martial arts movie fight scene. Unleash a Flying, Flipping, Spinning Kick on your opponents, but be careful to hang onto a Block or two for when they try to do the same to you!
As SlugFest's first published game, Kung Fu Fighting has always held a special place in our hearts and the hearts of our longtime fans. This exciting card game hit a really good sweet spot as a quick and light game that still had some interesting choices and lots of silly, over-the-top cinematic Kung Fu moments.
A typically over-the-top attack.
So after it was out of print we tried to Kickstart a totally new edition: fancy art, overhauled mechanics, higher production value, etc. Response was overwhelmingly meh.
Since that failed project, we've thought a lot about this game, and we still get occasional requests for reprints. After the success of our low-key print-on-demand version of En Garde Reforged, we decided we should do the same thing for Kung Fu Fighting.
We are very much using the KISS principle for this project: Keep It Simple, SlugFest! Rather than redoing everything (art, mechanics, etc.), we are simply creating a lightly-updated set of cards with the original art and mechanics and sending that off to our friends at DriveThruCards for printing.
However, as with the En Garde Reforged campaign, we have one stretch goal. If we pass $30k, we will do a manufacturing print run of the game instead. It will still be the lightly-updated original game, however. (For our previous Kung Fu Fighting campaign we underestimated the amount of love that was out there for the original version!)
As with our En Garde Reforged campaign, we can offer you the game right now, in a very functional, if minimalist way. Our colleagues at DriveThruCards do great, reliable work and are ready to publish this game through their print-on-demand services. In essence, your  pledge of support is a pre-order for the new print-on-demand version of the game, consisting of:
 Kung Fu Fighting deck
 More Kung Fu Fighting expansion, including extra cards for the base game, Archetype cards and cards for Team play
6 mini-player mats
2 large plastic deck boxes (the game is too big for just one!)
The rules will be available online and you will need to supply 6 objects to use as Chi Tokens  (which conveniently fit in the deck boxes!).
If demand for the game is high enough, then instead of offering a minimalist print-on-demand version of the game, we will manufacture a full production run of the game! Allow us to introduce you to our one and only over-funding milestone: the Kung Fu Master Stretch Goal!
As you can see, we do not have an all-or-nothing initial funding level. We can create and deliver the print-on-demand version of the game with even just a single backer. What this Kickstarter campaign is all about, however, is whether or not we can get enough folks interested in the game to elevate it to the next level, taking it from print-on-demand to full  manufacturing. Therefore, there are no nickel and dime micro-upgrades with dozens of micro-goals like you might expect from traditional board game campaigns. We only need one, all-or-nothing stretch goal: If we can raise $30,000 everyone's rewards upgrade for free, becoming a manufactured version of Kung Fu Fighting with all the bells and whistles, including:
 Kung Fu Fighting deck
 More Kung Fu Fighting expansion, including extra cards for the base game, Archetype cards and cards for Team play
6 full-size player mats
6 Chi Markers
1 Game Box with Cover Art
Rules
This upgrade includes all the usual micro-goals you usually see from  other campaigns: improved box, glossy rules, token upgrades, etc. Best  of all, even if we don’t hit the Kung Fu Master Stretch Goal, everyone will still be getting a great game (and, as a consolation prize, they'll be getting it way ahead of schedule)!
The unique nature of this campaign has some big ramifications on the estimated delivery date for the rewards. If we do not reach the Kung Fu Master Stretch Goal, we will ship rewards as soon as the campaign funds become available. Therefore, we actually have two estimated  delivery dates:
If we receive <$30,000 of funding, rewards will be shipped out by August 2019.
If we receive >$30,000 of funding, rewards will be shipped out by February 2020.
Because we can only list one estimated delivery date on the pledge levels we can offer, we opted to use the farthest out date.
Backers are required to fulfill all of their regional obligations for import. Unfortunately, there is no region-friendly shipping for this project.
In addition, we should note here that we will not be using a pledge manager for this project.
Interested in picking up some of our other games? Then head on over to SlugFestGames.com where you can get all of our games right now! Best of all, we are  offering free domestic shipping on all orders placed during the campaign!

updates.update_content: Hi everyone! We've launched a new kickstarter campaign today! It's for a tile-drafting "light euro" game called Dungeon Decorators, and we think you'll love it!

Hi again, Kung Fu Fighters. We have two announcements for you today:
1) At this point, everyone should definitely have their stuff. If you either haven't received your copy of Kung Fu Fighting, or you've received it but something is wrong, please let us know right away by emailing support@slugfestgames.com.
2) If you're also into our Red Dragon Inn series, you'll be happy to know that we launched a new campaign! Piper vs Ripsnarl introduces two new mortal enemies to the party at The Red Dragon Inn. Check it out!
Thanks for your support!

We made it! Thanks, everyone!
We didn't make that full-print-run stretch goal, but that's fine. The whole point of this campaign was to be flexible enough for the project to be a success at any funding level. So you won't be getting a fancy arted box containing your game - you'll just get the game, which is the important part, anyway...  :-)
Surveys are already live, so please fill them out right away! We plan to get games to people ASAP, so please tell us where to send them!

Hi again, backers! We hope that the previous updates have made you excited to try this game and its various variants. We're all set and ready to go to print, so things should go fairly smoothly once the campaign ends.
Kickstarter typically takes about two weeks to process everyone's payments and send us funds. We plan to ship things out shortly thereafter, so when the survey to get everyone's address goes live, please respond promptly!

Hi again, folks. Today, we're going to talk about another variant that was introduced with the More Kung Fu Fighting expansion - Team Play.
To play with teams, you will need either 4 or 6 players. If you have 6 players, you can play with two teams of three or three teams of two. Sit around the table, alternating by team - so for 4 players, you sit across from your teammate - ABAB. For 6 players, sit ABABAB or ABCABC.

Hi again, Kung Fu Fighters!
After the success of the original game, we did what any self-respecting game company would do - we made an expansion! And this reprint of the game includes both the original game and the expansion! More Kung Fu Fighting included a bunch of new cards, including several new card types:

Hi, backers! We figured we should take a moment to actually tell you all how this here Kung Fu Fighting game of ours is played. For you impatient types, we can say that the resources page is now up, and that page includes the rules document.
Want a bit more info? OK, here we go.
Kung Fu Fighting was not only our first game, it was also the first game in our "fighting series", which also included the later titles En Garde and High Noon Saloon. In these games, you simply play cards to beat up your opponents in an attempt to be the last fighter standing. Kung Fu Fighting is actually the most straightforward of these games.

Thanks for the support so far, everyone! We're super happy with how this campaign is going, and we're super happy that there's still so much love out there for this game.
We will have a handful of updates throughout the campaign, telling you about the game, the rules, the lightly-updated card design we're using, etc. In keeping with the KISS principle (Keep It Simple, SlugFest!), the updates won't be super formal, but they'll tell you what you want to know about the game.

campaign.story:
Batman™: Gotham City Chronicles is a mission-based miniatures board game where 2 to 4 players control the Dark Knight and his allies in their never-ending battle against crime through an asymmetrical and open game system.
Each game involves an action-packed fight where two sides face off. One of the players assumes the role of the Villain and controls the most notorious criminals of Gotham City. The remaining players take control of the Heroes,  who must work together as a team to foil the Villain’s plots. Each side  takes turns, pitting their strategies against each other in order to  achieve their objectives.
Each game of Batman™: Gotham City Chronicles is played according to a mission which describes the plot, location of the action, setup of the game,  number of turns, and the specific objectives each side is trying to  achieve in order to win the game.
The game involves two opposing  sides: the heroes and the villain. We wanted to represent that dynamic up front by making it obvious from the art on the boxes. That's right, boxes, because one box will not be enough to fit everything you will get.
But this separation has another purpose: it eases the setup of the game.  The hero box contains the hero boards, screens, cards... everything the  heroes need to play a mission. The villain box contains the miniatures,  tiles, dice, and everything needed to prepare the command board for the  fight to come. These 2 boxes will constitute the core game, which include all the base offerings plus all the Stretch Goals you have unlocked during the first campaign.

campaign.story:
Welcome to Themeborne’s third Kickstarter campaign. 
Whether you're a returning backer or just discovering the Escape the Dark™ series for the first time, this new campaign is for you.    
With great pleasure we introduce our latest game: Escape the Dark Sector™.
Fans of Escape the Dark Castle™ will feel right at home with Sector’s core gameplay, and should check out the What’s New? section below to discover its exciting new features.
Newcomers, a warm welcome to the Escape the Dark™ community. This is a great starting point for you, and if you’re curious about the journey so far you can view our previous campaign here.
Wherever you hail from, step aboard with us now as we launch the series into the farthest reaches of space…
Escape the Dark Sector™  is a simple, sci-fi adventure game with a focus on atmosphere, storytelling, and player cooperation – perfect for newcomers to tabletop gaming. It takes about 2 minutes to set up, lasts around 45 minutes, and no two games are ever the same.
Playing as the beleaguered crew of an impounded starship, players find themselves confined to the detention block of a vast space station. Using a variety of advanced gear and weaponry, they will embark on a desperate mission to find their ship and blast their way home.
Over the course of three acts the crew will have to overcome a variety of dangers, from cyborg guards and faulty replicators to killer alien organisms - each of which is represented by a large, beautifully illustrated chapter card.
As these immersive chapter cards are revealed one by one, the game takes on the form of a shared storybook experience, with the players making decisions about what to do each chapter before using a combination of dice and item cards to complete the challenges before them.
The goal of the game is to complete every chapter in the mission deck, and then defeat the final boss. To win, you must keep each member of the crew alive. If any player is killed the game ends immediately!
Escape the Dark Sector™ is inspired by classic sci-fi books, films, and TV programmes, including Alien, the original Star Wars trilogy, and Star Trek: The Next Generation to name a few – and of course, this being part of the Escape the Dark™ series, it also has its roots in the classic adventure experiences of the Fighting Fantasy gamebooks and the Dungeons & Dragons roleplaying game. 
Escape the Dark Sector™  has simple rules so it’s easy to learn. You’ll be able to get started within about 5 minutes. Below is a step-by-step overview, or scroll down for a gameplay video. If you’re interested in learning more you can read a very early draft of the rule book here. 
Keen to know what it's like to play Escape the Dark Sector? 
Sit back and enjoy this demo game with the team at On Tabletop: 
At its core, Escape the Dark Sector™ utilities the same narrative game engine as Castle, but adds several new features that make it a different experience altogether: 
 A 3-Act Adventure: The chapter cards which make up the mission deck are divided into three acts, each getting progressively more challenging as the mission goes on and each also offering different item drop-rates and a different ratio of encounter types - allowing for a new layer of decision making and strategy. 
 Thrilling Ranged Combat: From lowly Slug-pistols to formidable Beam-emitters, a ranged combat system has been designed from the ground up to add thrilling firefights to the adventure. But even with an array of weaponry at your disposal, teamwork remains vital to mission success. 
 Tactical Combat Actions: As the game’s intense firefights play out, the highly-trained crew have a wide selection of tactical options at their disposal - including Shoot, Charge, Take Cover, Flank, Ambush, Treat Wounds, and Reload. Forming a robust plan of attack is essential to taking down tough enemies. 
 Cybernetic Implants: Each member of the crew is fitted with a interchangeable neural-augmentation chip, giving them a unique enhancement to call upon during the adventure - from pain inhibitors to advanced-reflexes. Players will have the option to switch these out, either to swap with another member of the crew or to replace them with upgrades found along the way  - but doing so incurs an HP penalty! 
You can find more information about these and other features of the game, in our early draft rulebook here. 
Here's an interview with co-designer Thomas Pike, talking in more detail about some of the game's features: 
Since the game is still in development, the exact contents may vary from that shown here.
 What makes the ESCAPE THE DARK™ series different?
• It’s approachable - The game is designed with non-gamers in mind, but is no less rich and rewarding for it. Now anyone can enjoy the atmosphere of a classic sci-fi mission. 
• It’s quick - It takes less than 5 mins to set up and around 45 mins to play. No downtime, no elimination, and full player engagement throughout. No-one will be bored.
• It’s social - Many chapters offer a the group a choice, stimulating regular player interaction and discussion. It's perfect for the pub or a games cafe, but can even be played solo!
• It's different every time - You never know what the next chapter will be, so there is plenty of tension and suspense as your unique adventure unfolds each game.
• It has a unique look - Many games look alike these days. Here is something truly distinct for your collection. We've worked hard to create a stylish look evocative of retro classics.
• There are no heroes - The playable characters are refreshingly ordinary. No musclebound heroes or buxom heroines here, and there is an equal mix of male and female characters.  
• You'll be part of something big – With a wide range of Escape the Dark products already released, a wealth of adventure awaits you. Join our ever-growing community of players! 
We have organised our pledge levels and add-ons to allow every possible combination of rewards.
At each pledge level, on top of the pledge itself, a shipping charge will apply based on your location. We've done our best to keep those costs to a minimum. See the Shipping section for details.

Our £16k funding goal will cover the manufacturing and associated logistical costs of this campaign. But, if we are fortunate enough to exceed that goal we'd like to offer our backers the following freebies and upgrades:

 All backers will get the MP3 files delivered to them free of charge via Backerkit when the campaign delivers, and physical copies of the soundtrack on vinyl will be unlocked as an optional add-on.
UNLOCKED!   
At this level of funding, we'll commission two books by Thomas Paul Pike: 
Mission Log - a collection of interconnected short fiction, delving into the background stories of the crew and their ill-fated mission, and of course offering what little is known about the game's vile adversaries.
Death in Deep Space - adds contextual death scenes to gameplay.  No matter which chapter, item or boss brings about your untimely death, simply flip to the corresponding page for full immersion into the final events of the mission.  
All backers will get a free PDF of each of these books delivered to them via Backerkit, and physical copies of the books will be unlocked as an optional add-on.

At this level of funding, we'll produce a range of T-shirts for Escape the Dark Sector, available to all backers as a optional add-on. 
 At this level of funding, we'll produce a companion app for Escape the Dark Sector. Free to download when it launches, and compatible with both iOS and Android devices. 
Simple, elegant and atmospheric, it will be designed to be used on the tabletop alongside the physical game to do things like: 
Track Crew HP, play the soundtrack, display pages from Death in Deep Space, and offer searchable rules and FAQ. 
This will be free to all backers if we reach this level of funding, but may not deliver at the same time as the other items in this campaign. 
We can dream. 
While the best way to experience Escape the Dark Sector will always be on the tabletop, we can't deny making a digital version does sound fun. If we raise a million pounds, we'll take the plunge into computer games. 
This will be free to all backers, but may not deliver at the same time as the other items in this campaign. 
How does it work? 
To include add-ons in your pledge, simply increase your pledge amount by the total value of all the add-ons you want. 
At the end of the campaign you'll be given access to our pledge manager, Backerkit, which allows you to select exactly which items you want to put your pledged amount towards. 
Important note:
Ordering add-ons may in some cases increase shipping costs beyond the base level shown on the charts in our Shipping section. We'll calculate your new shipping total in Backerkit at the end of the campaign (based on your location and the total weight of your order). 
 In case you want more than one, we're offering additional copies of the main game. 
Luxurious card sleeves specially designed to protect your Escape the Dark Sector collection. 
 There are sleeves for both sizes of cards: A6 (large) and A8 (small). One pack of each is enough to completely sleeve the game.
Take your game to the next level of desirability with our beautifully illustrated neoprene playmats - transforming your play area into a computer terminal. Each mat serves one member of the crew. 
There is a lot going on in the mission area during a game of Escape the Dark Sector. Add a bit of 'mission control' to your experience with this evocative playmat.  
A soundtrack specially composed by Escape the Dark Castle co-designer and illustrator Alex Crispin to perfectly accompany gameplay, housed in a luxurious sleeve. A must for collectors. 
Prepare to immerse yourself even further into the Dark Sector with Mission Log - a collection of short fiction penned by published game-writer and co-designer of Escape the Dark Castle, Thomas Pike. Delve into the background stories of the crew and their ill-fated mission, and learn what little is known about the game's vile adversaries.
Add a new narrative dimension to your games with Death in Deep Space, containing a contextual 'death scene' for every chapter card in the game capable of killing you, and of course for the bosses too.
No matter which chapter card finishes you off, you'll be able to flip to the corresponding page and read out all the gory details of your demise. What better way to end a game of Escape the Dark Sector?
If you choose to pledge for the Join the Crew add-on, our incredible game artist Alex Crispin will hand draw an exclusive crew portrait - of you! 
How it works: 
Pick the crew member you'd like to become, then take a photo of yourself which meets our guidelines (we'll send these out after the campaign).We do the rest. You'll get two copies of the card - one to use and one to keep pristine or frame as a rare collectors item. The cards will be produced to full game specification, and will be fully playable when paired with the die of your chosen character. 
Imagine the satisfaction when you Escape the Dark Sector personally!
Escape the Dark Castle Bundles
If you missed out on our first game, this is the perfect chance to catch up, and save money while you're at it. You have three bundles to choose from: 
Bundle A - £85.00
(RRP £99.94) 
The full monty - perfect for those just starting out who want to get up right up to date. Includes the main game and all expansions released so far:

You can combine any number of these bundles if you wish. For example if you want to get everything from the ETDC range, you can add both Bundle A and Bundle C. 
And remember all of the items in these bundles are available separately as shown below, allowing you to tailor your own combinations if you prefer -  including the much sought-after Become a Prisoner!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Is the game any good?

Our first game, Escape the Dark Castle, was highly praised, garnering dozens of positive reviews and selling well across the world. It currently holds a rating of 8/10 of board game geek. It has so far been released in three languages and more will follow. 

Escape the Dark Sector is still in development, but we're building on the solid foundations of the same, tried and tested game engine, carefully adding tasteful new gameplay elements which embrace the new theme. Everything will be thoroughly tested before release to ensure this too is an immersive and fun experience for all. As we enter our third campaign, we're confident in what we create. 

Will the materials be good quality?

Our manufacturing partner Dofine Games did an amazing job producing the Escape the Dark Castle range to our demanding standards. We're glad to say we will be working with Dofine again so we can be sure to maintain Themeborne's high standard of quality with Escape the Dark Sector. 

Will it ever arrive?

We're known for our reliable shipping and great customer service. We take the logistical side of our projects very seriously. Both of our previous campaigns have been delivered within a month of the estimate. 

We're ready for this, we've done it twice before and we're excited to do it again. All we need now is a cracking campaign to see it through.

We appreciate your support!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
With great pleasure we can confirm fulfilment has begun on the Crew Playmats!

Themeborne is closing down for a few days for the Christmas holidays, and want to wish all our backers around the world a very Happy Christmas from the depths if the Dark Sector!
We'll be back in the new year with an update on the delivery estimates for the last few remaining items from this campaign, but with the ports currently looking like this (see below) we thank you for continuing to be patient - we promise you will all get everything you pledged for in the end, even if it takes another month or two to emerge from this madness.

Dear Backers, 
Following on from our last update, we've been informed that the arrival of the Crew playmats is now estimated for late November. That is for the European hub, and we're still waiting for word on the US hub arrival dates. 
This means we now estimate delivery to you of these last few items (books included) will take place in early December. We understand this is very frustrating news, and needless to say this is a very painful situation for us too in an already difficult time.

Dear Backers, 
We hope you've all been enjoying Escape the Dark Sector!
For those of you waiting on the Crew Playmats, we can confirm production was completed in September and we're still just awaiting on shipping news (as in shipping the playmats to our fulfilment centres).

Dear Backers,
Your amazing support of this campaign unlocked the stretch goal of an original soundtrack, free to all backers as a digital download. This marvellous creation is now available, and every backer will get an email invite this weekend from Backerkit with a link to where you can grab the MP3 files.
The soundtrack was specially composed by Alex Crispin to accompany the structure of gameplay:

Dear backers, 
Even though the game is now shipping, this is not goodbye! 
Over the years we are proud to have built up a great community of backers and players. We're lucky to have you, and while we will soon be moving away from this campaign page we wanted to let you know we're still here to help, and there are lots of ways you can continue to be involved.
Stay in touch

Shipping has begun!
Exciting news - we've now had confirmation that the North American hub has begun rolling out your rewards, and the European hub is in the final stages of prep -  expecting to begin shipping from there in a day or two. 
When your parcel ships, you'll get an email confirmation from fulfilment team with your so you can follow its progress. Of course, with so many parcels to ship it may take a week or so before every single parcel has left the hub - so please don't panic if you don't get an email right away.

Risks and challenges
Mojito Studios is a newborn publishing house, but it comes from a 10 year long experience in the boardgame world and as a natural consequence of a planned growth over the course of time. This is our first Kickstarter campaign: everything must begin somewhere, so what could have been better to begin our experience on KS than a project as big as “Cleopatra and the Society of Architects: Deluxe Edition”? We want to assure you that we worked hard for this KS to be a success: we contacted professionals to guarantee the highest possible quality throughout the planning, production and shipment phases. Of course, unexpected events can happen in every project, but we can ensure you that we have made all the possible, foreseeable arrangements to minimize their possible impact. The estimated date of arrival of “Cleopatra and the Society of Architects: Deluxe Edition” is March 2020, but keep in mind that this is just approximate and that we will do everything in our power to release it earlier. As soon as the game is ready, we will ship it to all the backers: keep in mind, though, that, due to international shipping logistics, backers from some regions might receive their rewards before. We will do everything we can to make sure you will get the best possible experience and to deserve your trust. We need your help to make this project come true and we hope you will support us: stay with us, then, and we will see our dream come to life!

Thank you, 

Mojito Studios Team

When they grow older, every Kodama is given a tree of their own, and it's their job to watch over it and help it grow healthy and strong. From trunk to twig, they must keep it green and growing, the perfect home for flowers, mushrooms, and critters of all kinds. Even other kodama love to travel around and visit new trees. Now it's your turn! Create your own masterpiece of branches and leaves, and make the forest even more beautiful!
Last year Indie Boards and Cards Cards & Action Phase Games released the inTREEging two player Kodama Duo with the “I pick, you choose drafting mechanic.” This year we are excited to expand the Kodama universe with a modular, three dimensional tree. If you aren’t familiar with Kodama: The Tree Spirits, you can check out the BGG page or watch Rahdo Runs Through for a playthrough and review.

This playmat isn’t necessary – but it is very functional! If you want the playmat sent with your rewards, add $15 to your pledge. You can add more than one copy.
This promo pack includes the 16 promos from the deluxe version of Kodama: the Tree Spirits, the 6 promos for Kodama and 6 promos for Kokoro from the Kokoro Kickstarter campaign, the Dark Kodama promo, and the 4 promos for Kodama and Kodama Duo from the Duo Kickstarter campaign.
Kodama 3D is a three-dimensional tree building game for 1-4 players that plays in 30-40 minutes. For more information, we encourage you to view the videos directly below, or simply read our draft rulebook here.

Note that anything marked with these symbols are: 
Kickstarter Exclusive - An exclusive item for Kickstarter backers with remaining stock available through conventions and special promotions only.
 Kodama 3D is the 50th project from the combined teams behind Indie Boards and Cards & Action Phase Games. With the successful execution of our first 49 projects, we have become experienced publishers with a reputation for great games (in design and production) that are delivered in a timely fashion. 
 Kodama 3D was designed by the talented Erica Hayes-Bouyouris (Bosk) and Daryl Andrews (Sagrada, City of Gears, Bosk). This game has undergone extensive testing and development to ensure the best possible experience. We are confident that this game will be in your collection for years to come. 
 Kodama 3D is a three-dimensional tree building game with tactical movement that has beautiful table presence.
All of the art assets are complete and ready for immediate upload after the project funds.

A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge." 
In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "rewards," depending on the amount you pledge. For example, if you pledge $24 to help back the project, we'll offer you a copy of the game along with any stretch goals we achieve as soon as it is manufactured.

Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Twitter, and share with your friends and family. Also, be sure to like Indie Boards and Cards on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for real-time updates about this project and more!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is the 50th Kickstarter project from the combined teams behind Indie Boards and Cards & Action Phase Games. We have learned how to streamline the game publishing process and have successfully delivered all of our previous Kickstarter projects to thousands of supporters. Our previous experiences will enable us to also deliver this project on time and we have every confidence that Kodama 3D will be on schedule and of the highest possible quality.

That said, there are always complexities and considerations in a project of this scope that may cause delays. Indie Boards and Cards & Action Phase Games will use contract manufacturing to make this game, freight forwarders to get games through customs, and 3rd parties like Amazon, the US Post Office, and FEDEX to ship the games to you – we don't control everything and there are lots of opportunities for delay. We have a track record of making everything work out for backers in the end – so please be confident and supportive of our efforts to get this great game into your hands.

REFUND POLICY
We can refund you within 14 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that, we have a policy of no questions asked, though that’s minus 20% for Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from them after 14 days). However, if we’ve begun packaging your pledge for shipment (usually 4 to 6 weeks before the actual shipping date), no refunds are possible. If a component cannot be delivered AT ALL, we refund that completely, including fees.

All refunds after the 14 days close of the campaign may be processed via PayPal or reversed via Stripe to your credit card at our discretion. Refunds within 14 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit card.

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials, and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active.
If you do not log in and submit your project survey results (ie, provide us with your shipping address) for your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your pledge (at additional cost for international backers) if you complete your project survey after the 8-week window has elapsed.

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project but instead wait for the general release.
